name: eServer for Android
short_description:
eServer is your mobile webserver solution for your android deviceThis is a web server suite applications for android devices. Includes standard web server. A php addon, perl & CGI addons, MySQL server, and an FTP server.
Webpage content will be saved on your sd card for easy editing and changing.

optional plugins should include:

ASP support
E-mail Server
Web document editor and cheat sheets
jQuery libraries
MySQL database tool (PHPmyAdmin)

The term Should Include means it may or may not include some addons depending on versions of this app and android versions out.

THERE WILL BE NO APP SUPPORT FOR IPHONE, IPAD or ANY APPLE DEVICES, PERIOD!

We try to dev our apps to be usable with Android version 2.2.2 and up with some special exceptions for older Android versions if needed.

Hopefully this app will be slim enough to not hog resources but powerful enough to run a CMS like wordpress, joomla or phpbb.

See wiki for more info
